title: Automotive Event Planners Aimee Shackleford / Johnny Valencia
description:
Aimee Shackleford and Johnny Valencia are the minds behind some of the coolest events and most popular rallies. As automotive event organizers, if there are crwods and supercars there, they probably have a hand in it. They're here to talk about what goes into planning an event, why Miatas are a nice break from R8s, and more. If you're wondering how to get into the automotive industry, this is a good listen. 

http://www.gearoneagency.com/

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/-r5MEWd223s

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @petrolgirl @southerngermanation 

 

NEW SHIRTS!

https://www.blipshift.com/tst
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
